log.rollDouble1: {{player}} has rolled a {{diceRoll}}. That's a double!
log.rollDouble2: {{player}} has rolled a {{diceRoll}}. That's a second double!
log.rollDouble3: {{player}} has rolled a third double and therefore goes straight into jail!
log.rollAgain: {{player}} must roll again because he had a double.
log.jailRoll: {{player}} did not roll doubles and therefore must stay in jail.
log.jailWait_one: {{player}} waits in jail for one turn. ({{count}} turn remaining)
log.jailWait_other: {{player}} waits in jail for one turn. ({{count}} turns remaining)
log.buyOrAuction: {{propertyName}} has no owner. {{player}} can choose to buy it for ${{cost}}.
log.payDoubleRentTo: {{player1}} pays ${{cost}} to {{player2}} (double rent because {{player2}} owns all sites of the color group).
